feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Azure and Power Platform scenarios
entry.summary: Learn about architectures and solutions that use Azure together with Microsoft Power Platform.

entry.title: Architectural approaches for AI and ML in multitenant solutions
entry.summary: This article describes approaches to support multitenancy for the artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) components of your solution.

entry.title: Tiered data for analytics
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Stack Hub and Azure to stage, analyze, process, sanitize, and store data across multiple on-premises and cloud locations.

entry.title: Architectural approaches for messaging in multitenant solutions
entry.summary: This article describes approaches for messaging in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Trusted Internet Connection (TIC) 3.0 compliance
entry.summary: Deliver Trusted Internet Connection (TIC) 3.0 compliance for your internet-facing Azure applications and services, and improve the user experience.

entry.title: Actuarial risk analysis and financial modeling
entry.summary: How an actuarial developer can move an existing solution plus supporting infrastructure to Azure.

entry.title: Data management in banking
entry.summary: Describes techniques of managing data in a regulated banking environment using Microsoft Azure.

entry.title: Enable the financial services risk lifecycle with Azure and R
entry.summary: Learn about risk calculations, which are pivotal at several stages in the lifecycle of key financial services operations.

entry.title: Risk grid computing in banking
entry.summary: Presents the business considerations of implementing risk grid computing in banking on Azure.

entry.title: Risk grid computing solution
entry.summary: Introduces technical aspects of implementing Azure Batch for risk grid computing in banking.

entry.title: Implement the Azure healthcare blueprint for AI
entry.summary: This article provides guidance for the Microsoft Azure blueprint for AI.

entry.title: High-performance computing for manufacturing
entry.summary: Overview for the high-power compute need in the manufacturing industry.

entry.title: Extract actionable insights from IoT data
entry.summary: Extract insights from IoT data with Azure services.

entry.title: Introduction to predictive maintenance in manufacturing
entry.summary: Overview of how to develop predictive maintenance (PdM) for manufacturing customers on Azure.

entry.title: Predictive maintenance solution
entry.summary: Solution description of how to develop predictive maintenance for manufacturing customers on Azure.

entry.title: Migrate your e-commerce solution to Azure
entry.summary: This article explains the phases of migrating ecommerce infrastructure from on premises to Azure.

entry.title: Reuse recommender systems and algorithms from R with Azure
entry.summary: How to reuse and optimize recommendation apps written in the R language. Relies on Machine Learning Server on Azure VMs.

entry.title: Data management in the retail industry
entry.summary: Retailors have large data stores of unused data from which they may gain valuable insights. This article discusses how Microsoft Azure can help effectively use that data.

entry.title: SKU optimization for consumer brands
entry.summary: Retail industry assortment optimization. SKU optimization through insights from AI and ML.

entry.title: Visual search in retail with Cosmos DB
entry.summary: This article explains the phases of migrating ecommerce infrastructure from on premises to Azure.

entry.title: Solutions for the education industry
entry.summary: Discover architectures and ideas for using Azure services to build solutions in the education industry.

entry.title: Security architecture design
entry.summary: Get an overview of Azure security technologies, guidance offerings, solution ideas, and reference architectures.

entry.title: Azure Database for PostgreSQL considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Database for PostgreSQL that are useful when working with multitenanted systems, and it provides links to guidance and examples.

entry.title: Hybrid geo-distributed architecture
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Traffic Manager to direct traffic to specific cloud and on-premises endpoints based on various metrics.

entry.title: Cross-cloud scaling with Traffic Manager
entry.summary: Use Azure Traffic Manager to automatically add resources to an existing app to accommodate an increase in load.

entry.title: Cross-cloud scaling - on-premises data
entry.summary: Learn how to build a hybrid app that spans Azure and Azure Stack Hub. The solution uses a single on-premises data source.

entry.title: Identity architecture design
entry.summary: Control access to your apps and data by designing and implementing an identity solution. See resources with guidelines, best practices, and recommendations.

entry.title: Customer 360 with Azure Synapse and Dynamics 365 Customer Insights
entry.summary: Build an end-to-end Customer 360 solution by using Azure Synapse Analytics and Dynamics 360 Customer Insights.

entry.title: Real-time fraud detection
entry.summary: Analyze data in real time to detect fraudulent transactions or other anomalous activity, using Azure Event Hubs and Stream Analytics.

entry.title: Monitor a microservices app in AKS
entry.summary: Learn about best practices for monitoring a microservices application that runs on Azure Kubernetes Service, by collecting telemetry from the application.

entry.title: N-tier architecture style
entry.summary: Know the benefits, challenges, and best practices for N-tier architectures on Azure. An N-tier architecture splits an app into logical layers and physical tiers.

entry.title: End-to-end governance in Azure
entry.summary: When using CI/CD pipelines to automate deployments, apply RBAC not just on the ARM side, but also earlier in the process as developers check in their code.

entry.title: Solutions for the facilities and real estate industries
entry.summary: Get an overview of architectures and ideas for using Azure services to build solutions for the facilities and real estate industries.

entry.title: Microservices assessment and readiness
entry.summary: Use this guide as a checklist of considerations to keep in mind when you move to a microservices architecture.

entry.title: Solutions for the automotive, mobility, and transportation industries
entry.summary: See architectures and ideas that use Azure services to build efficient, scalable, and reliable solutions in the automotive, mobility, and transportation industries.

entry.title: Conditional Access architecture and personas
entry.summary: Learn about a Conditional Access architecture and personas that support Zero Trust principles.

entry.title: Conditional Access design principles and dependencies
entry.summary: Learn design principles and dependencies for a Conditional Access scenario that's based on Zero trust.

entry.title: Conditional Access framework and policies
entry.summary: Get a detailed description of a recommended Conditional Access framework and a starting point for policies.

entry.title: Conditional Access for Zero Trust
entry.summary: An introduction to a design and framework for implementing Zero Trust principles by using Azure AD Conditional Access.

entry.title: Hybrid relay connection in Azure and Azure Stack Hub
entry.summary: Learn how to connect to edge resources or devices that are protected by firewalls. This architecture uses Azure Relay in a hybrid scenario.

entry.title: Solutions for the travel and hospitality industries
entry.summary: Architectures and ideas for using Azure services to build solutions in the travel and hospitality industries.

entry.title: Databases architecture design
entry.summary: This article provides an overview of the Azure database solutions described in Azure Architecture Center.

entry.title: Edge Workload Configuration pattern
entry.summary: Learn how to design your workload configuration processes to control the complexity of devices and systems on your shop floors.

entry.title: Storage design
entry.summary: Get an overview of Azure Storage technologies, guidance offerings, solution ideas, and reference architectures.

entry.title: Automated API deployments using APIOps
entry.summary: Use APIOps with an Azure API Management instance to build and deploy APIs. This solution provides self-service tools, auditing, policy enforcement, and early feedback.

entry.title: DevOps with Azure Stack Hub
entry.summary: Code from a single location and deploy to multiple targets in development, test, and production environments that may be in your local datacenter, private clouds, or the public cloud.

entry.title: SaaS digital business journey on Azure
entry.summary: Build your Software as a Service (Saas). There are links that help you: get started with Azure; build, deploy, and publish your app; and build audience.

entry.title: Solutions for the game development industry
entry.summary: Architectures and ideas for using Azure services to build solutions in the game development industry.

entry.title: Manage data across Azure SQL estate with Azure Purview
entry.summary: Improve your organization's governance process by using Azure Purview in your Azure SQL estate.

entry.title: Architectural approaches for governance and compliance in multitenant solutions
entry.summary: This article describes approaches to consider for governance and compliance in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: DataOps checklist
entry.summary: DataOps is a lifecycle approach to data analytics that uses agile practices to deliver high-quality data. Use this checklist to assess your DataOps process.

entry.title: Data management across Azure Data Lake with Azure Purview
entry.summary: Use Azure Purview to build a foundation for data governance and management that can produce and deliver high-quality, trusted data.

entry.title: DevSecOps with a rolling main branching strategy
entry.summary: Improve developer velocity and security with DevSecOps and GitHub during the entire development process using a shift-left strategy.

entry.title: Use Azure Firewall to help protect an AKS cluster
entry.summary: Deploy an AKS cluster in a hub-and-spoke network topology by using Terraform and Azure DevOps. Help protect the inbound and outbound traffic by using Azure Firewall.

entry.title: Azure NAT Gateway considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of NAT Gateway that are useful when you work with multitenanted systems. It also provides links to guidance and examples for how to use NAT Gateway in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Teacher-provisioned virtual labs in Azure
entry.summary: Learn how you can use Azure Lab Services to set up identical VMs from templates, for use in training, customer demos, and software development.

entry.title: Automate document processing by using Azure Form Recognizer
entry.summary: Build an automated document processing pipeline. Use Azure Form Recognizer to extract data and natural language processing models to enrich the data.

entry.summary: This article provides a reference architecture for deploying and running SWIFT Alliance Access on Azure.

entry.summary: This article provides a reference architecture for deploying and running SWIFT Alliance Messaging Hub (AMH) on Azure.

entry.title: SWIFT on Azure
entry.summary: This article is a landing page for all SWIFT components that can be deployed on Azure.

entry.title: Loosely coupled quantum computing
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Quantum to implement hybrid quantum applications that use a loosely coupled model.

entry.title: Tightly coupled quantum computing
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Quantum to implement hybrid quantum applications that use a tightly coupled model.

entry.summary: Learn about DevOps requirements for quantum-based apps. DevOps provides a repeatable, high-quality process for building, deploying, and monitoring software.

entry.title: CI/CD for quantum computing jobs
entry.summary: Learn how to orchestrate CI/CD of the quantum computing components of your classical applications to create replicable, manageable hybrid solutions.

entry.title: Azure digital twins builder
entry.summary: Learn how a web app can use Azure Digital Twins and Autodesk Forge API to accelerate the process of creating digital twins from Build Information Modeling (BIM) models.

entry.title: Deploy machine learning models to multiple lines
entry.summary: This article describes an architecture that you can use to deploy machine learning models to multiple data sources.

entry.title: Automating diagnostic Jupyter Notebook execution
entry.summary: Learn now to automate diagnostic or routine notebooks by using an Azure serverless architecture.

entry.title: DevOps checklist
entry.summary: Use this checklist to assess your DevOps culture and process. DevOps integrates development, QA, and IT operations into a unified set of processes.

entry.summary: This article describes how to organize your Azure resources in a multitenant solution.

entry.summary: Explore Azure Virtual Desktop and learn to build virtual desktop infrastructure solutions at enterprise scale.

entry.summary: This example demonstrates a SAP deployment on virtual machines on Azure, along with a High Availability Oracle database.

entry.title: Valet Key pattern
entry.summary: Use a token or key that provides clients with restricted direct access to a specific resource or service.

entry.summary: Create an AI solution using Azure IoT Edge Vision. Explore camera recommendations, hardware acceleration, machine learning, image storage, alerts, and UI.

entry.summary: Proven practices for running SAP HANA in a high-availability, scale-up environment that supports disaster recovery on Azure.

entry.summary: Build a DevOps CI/CD pipeline for a Node.js web app with Jenkins, Azure Container Registry, Azure Kubernetes Service, Cosmos DB, and Grafana.

entry.summary: Run OPM Flow reservoir simulation software and OPM ResInsight visualization software on an Azure HPC compute cluster and visualization VM.

entry.summary: This example shows how to use Azure Content Delivery Network and other Azure services to deploy a highly scalable and secure installation of WordPress.

entry.summary: This is a solution idea that builds on the multiple forests scenario, using Azure Virtual Desktop and Azure Active Directory Domain Services.

entry.summary: Learn how to design infrastructure for highly available virtualized and containerized workloads in remote office/branch office (ROBO) scenarios.

entry.summary: This solution delivers an optimized approach to disaster recovery of virtual machine (VM)-based user workloads hosted on Azure Stack Hub.

entry.summary: Build a scalable solution for batch scoring models on a schedule in parallel using Azure Machine Learning.

entry.summary: Learn about proven practices for deploying web applications that use Azure App Service and Azure SQL Database.

entry.summary: Implement a secure site-to-site network architecture that spans an Azure virtual network and an on-premises network connected using Azure ExpressRoute.

entry.summary: Learn tips for how to troubleshoot a VPN gateway connection between an on-premises network and Azure.

entry.summary: Learn about Gridwich audio and video content protection for publishing with Azure Media Services DRM, and how to create and update content protection policies.

entry.summary: Learn how Gridwich uses Azure Media Services V2 and V3 SDKs to set up authentication and authorization, and how to scale Media Services resources for media processing.

entry.summary: Follow these instructions to test Gridwich Azure Media Services encoding locally or in Azure by using the Azure Event Grid Viewer Blazor.

entry.summary: Learn how Gridwich converts Azure Pipelines pipeline variable group variables to Terraform variables.

entry.summary: Use this architecture to accelerate development of reliable, high-performing chat applications.

entry.summary: Use AKS to easily ingest and process a real-time data stream, with millions of data points collected via sensors.

entry.summary: Build and deploy a machine learning model with SQL Server 2016 with R Services to predict whether a bank loan will soon need to be charged off.

entry.summary: Use a canonical architecture to achieve high availability for Oracle Database Enterprise Edition in Azure.

entry.summary: Improve app performance by using Azure Cache for Redis to improve responsiveness and handle increasing loads with fewer web-compute resources.

entry.summary: This article describes approaches to consider for networking in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: AI-based footfall detection
entry.summary: The article provides an overview for implementing an AI-based footfall detection solution, which analyzes visitor traffic in retail stores. The solution generates insights from real-world actions, by using Azure, Azure Stack Hub, and the Custom Vision AI Dev Kit.

entry.summary: Use Azure Route Server to manage the dynamic routing between NVAs and virtual networks. Simplify NVA maintenance, and avoid manually updating route tables.

entry.summary: This article describes how to manage Microsoft 365 tenant configuration by using Microsoft365DSC and Azure DevOps.

entry.summary: Learn how to implement resilient NetApp file shares. Failure of the primary Azure region causes automatic failover to the secondary Azure region.

entry.summary: This article describes a high-availability blue/green deployment solution for applications on Azure Spring Cloud.

entry.summary: Examine deployment patterns for SAP systems on Oracle Database that align with the pillars of the Azure Well-Architected Framework.

entry.summary: This example scenario implements an e-commerce front end using Azure platform as a service tools, which allow you to handle increases in transactions.

entry.summary: This scenario describes a web application that provides an interface for on-technical users to use artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) to perform decision analysis techniques. These techniques help you rapidly gain insights and make informed predictions.

entry.summary: Optimize when and how to contact potential customers to improve marketing campaign success rates with machine learning and SQL Server 2016 with R Services.

entry.summary: Use Azure Cosmos DB for retail and e-commerce apps to support in-depth queries over diverse product catalogs, traffic spikes, and rapidly changing inventory.

entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure IoT to enhance a retail solution for stores implementing buy online, pickup in store scenarios.

entry.summary: Extend your on-premises big data investments to the cloud. Transform your business by using the advanced analytics capabilities of Azure HDInsight.

entry.summary: This article describes how to design a single network that has varying security and performance requirements.

entry.summary: Synapse serverless is a fast way to do EDA over a data lake or lakehouse. Self-service analytics is easy for business analysts who understand some SQL.

entry.summary: Manage virtual machine compliance without impairing DevOps practices. Use Azure VM Image Builder and Azure Compute Gallery to minimize risk from system images.

entry.summary: This article demonstrates how to conceptualize, architect, build, and deploy an application that uses projects from the CNCF after deployment of AKS.

entry.summary: Learn about Azure services that can help you build a multiparty computing solution, which can include cloud-based and on-premises resources.

entry.summary: Learn how to provide high-availability desktop access to file shares in an environment with many on-premises locations, and a workforce that works on-premises and remotely.

entry.summary: Set up improved-security private connectivity to a multitenant web app or function app from an on-premises network or from within an Azure virtual network.

entry.summary: This architecture provides an example delta lake for travel booking, where large amounts of raw documents are generated at a high frequency.

entry.summary: Application Gateway is commonly used to load balance traffic to Container Instances container groups. This article explores automation for rotated IP addresses.

entry.summary: How to use Azure Cosmos DB, change feed, and Azure Service Bus for reliable messaging and guaranteed delivery of domain events in distributed applications.

entry.summary: Learn about scaling Azure AI and machine learning environments that must comply with extensive security policies.

entry.summary: Store security logs in Azure Data Explorer on a long-term basis. This solution minimizes costs and provides easy access when you need to query the data.

entry.summary: Protect Azure VMs by implementing two types of just-in-time access. Align with security principles like defense in depth, least privilege, and zero trust.

entry.summary: This architecture uses Azure Stream Analytics to ingest data to an Azure Synapse dedicated SQL pool in high throughput scenarios.

entry.summary: Get started with Azure VMware Solution foundation block landing zone. Understand how Azure VMware Solution fits into a larger landing zone implementation.

entry.title: Azure VMware Solution networking
entry.summary: Get started with Azure VMware Solution foundation block networking. Understand what networking solution options exists and how to choose between them.

entry.title: Multi-region N-tier application
entry.summary: Deploy an application on Azure virtual machines in multiple regions for high availability and resiliency.

entry.title: Suggest content tags with deep learning and NLP
entry.summary: Use Microsoft AI to improve website content tagging accuracy by combining deep learning and natural language processing (NLP) with data on site-specific search terms.

entry.title: Gridwich clean monolith architecture
entry.summary: Learn about the components and libraries in the Gridwich clean monolith architecture, and a microservices alternative.

entry.title: Multi-tier web application built for HA/DR
entry.summary: Learn how to create a resilient multitier web application built for high availability and disaster recovery on Azure.

entry.title: Highly available multi-region web app
entry.summary: Learn how to run an Azure App Service application in multiple regions to achieve high availability, by following this reference architecture.

entry.title: Serverless application architectures using Event Grid
entry.summary: Use Event Grid to connect data sources and event handlers. Trigger a serverless function to run image analysis when a new photo enters a blob storage container.

entry.title: Gridwich saga orchestration
entry.summary: Understand the concepts and roles of sagas and saga participants in orchestrating Gridwich workflows.

entry.title: Solutions for the manufacturing industry
entry.summary: Architectures and ideas to use Azure services for building efficient, scalable, and reliable manufacturing solutions.

entry.title: Finance management apps with Azure DB for MySQL
entry.summary: Use Azure Database for MySQL to securely store critical data and provide users with high-value analytics and insights over aggregated data.

entry.title: Finance management apps using Azure Database for PostgreSQL
entry.summary: Use Azure Database for PostgreSQL to securely store critical data and provide users with high-value analytics and insights over aggregated data.

entry.title: Unisys mainframe migration with Asysco
entry.summary: Learn about options for using the Asysco Automated Migration Technology (AMT) Framework to migrate Unisys mainframe workloads to Azure.

entry.title: Run a highly available SharePoint Server 2016 farm in Azure
entry.summary: This reference architecture shows proven practices for deploying a highly available SharePoint Server 2016 farm on Azure, using MinRole topology and SQL Server Always On availability groups.

entry.title: Cache access tokens in a multitenant app
entry.summary: Learn how to implement a custom token cache that derives from the Azure AD Authentication Library TokenCache class suitable for web apps.

entry.title: Dynamics Business Central as a service on Azure
entry.summary: This example shows how to establish the production environment for Business Central in partner private Azure environment.

entry.title: Data cache
entry.summary: Store and share database query results, session states, static contents, and more, by using a common cache-aside pattern.

entry.title: Refactor IBM z/OS coupling facility
entry.summary: Learn how Azure services and components can provide scale-out performance comparable to IBM z/OS mainframe CF and Parallel Sysplex capabilities.

entry.title: AKS regulated cluster for PCI-DSS 3.2.1 - Data protection
entry.summary: Best practices for securing data as per Requirement 3 and 4 of PCI-DSS 3.2.1.

entry.title: AKS regulated cluster for PCI-DSS 3.2.1 - Network segmentation
entry.summary: Best practices for setting up networking as per Requirement 1 and 2 of PCI-DSS 3.2.1.

entry.title: Baseline architecture for an AKS cluster
entry.summary: Reference architecture for a baseline infrastructure that deploys an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster.

entry.title: Azure Functions security
entry.summary: Learn about and implement Azure Functions security essentials, secure hosting setup, and application security guidance.

entry.title: Azure Well-Architected Framework review of Azure Application Gateway
entry.summary: This guidance provides best practices for the Application Gateway v2 family of SKUs, based on the five pillars of architecture excellence.

entry.title: Extract, transform, and load (ETL) using HDInsight
entry.summary: Extract, transform, and load (ETL) big data clusters on demand by using Azure HDInsight, Hadoop MapReduce, and Apache Spark.

entry.title: Back up files and apps on Azure Stack Hub
entry.summary: This solution delivers an optimized approach to backing up and restoring files and applications of VM-based user workloads hosted on Azure Stack Hub.

entry.title: Instant broadcasting on serverless architecture
entry.summary: Simplify one-to-many real-time communication and updates by using SignalR Service and the serverless code of Azure Functions.

entry.title: Centralized app configuration and security
entry.summary: Use Azure App Configuration and Azure Key Vault to create a centralized and secured configuration service for apps.

entry.title: Parallel bulk data import in SQL partition tables
entry.summary: Build partitioned tables for fast parallel bulk importing of data to a SQL Server database.

entry.title: Hybrid file services
entry.summary: Use Azure File Sync and Azure Files to extend file services hosting capabilities across cloud and on-premises file share resources.
